text: Ba Xudo savgand mexūrand, ki naguftaand, vale kalimai kufrro ʙar zaʙon rondaand. Va pas az on ki islom ovarda ʙudand, kofir şudaand. Va qasdkorī kardand, ammo ʙa on noil naşudand. Ajʙçūiaşon az on rūst, ki Xudovu pajomʙaraş az ƣanimatho ʙosarvataşon kardand. Pas, agar tavʙa kunand, xajraşon dar on ast va agar rūjgardon şavand. Xudo ʙa azoʙi dardnoke dar dunjovu oxirat azoʙaşon xohad kard va onhoro dar rūi zamin na dūstdore xohad ʙud va na madadkore
